Text: The file is corrupt or unsuported by my sony bluray player
@Jude_Law try playing it with vlc media player on your computer.
On PC works just fine with VLC, but on my sony bluray-player the file is corrupt. Other 720p release's of One Piece works perfect on bluray-player, but this one is corrupt!
No your blu ray player is crap or the drivers aren't up to date. If the file was bad it wouldn't work on anything.
